con:restRequest.name: AddSurvey
con:restRequest.con:request: { "SurveyDescription": "Survey${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS").format(new Date())}", "SurveyCode": "${ChkIfSurveyExist#surveycode}", "SurveyTypeId": "${GetSurveyType#Response#$[0]['SurveyTypeId']}", "CategoryId": "${GetSurveyCategory#Response#$[0]['CategoryId']}", "IsDefaultSurvey": "false", "DisplayCorrectInd": false, "DisplayCorrectAnswerInd": false, "SurveyClassId": "${GetStdSurveyClass#Response#$[0]['SurveyClassId']}", "DisplayScoreInd": false, "SurveyStartDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+4)}", "SurveyEndDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+15)}", "SurveyTimeZone": "UTC", "IntroductoryCaption": "${SurveyMoment#IntroductoryCaption}", "CompletionMessage": "${SurveyMoment#CompletionMessage}" }

con:restRequest.name: BuildSurvey
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "SurveyId": "${SurveyId#result}", "ProgramCode": "PP", "Questions": [ { "QuestionId": "${GetQuesByID1#Response#$['QuestionId']}", "QuestionDescription": "${GetQuesByID1#Response#$['QuestionDescription']}", "IsRequired": false, "ResponseTypeCode": "Radio Button", "ValidationTypeCode": "Required", "QuestionOrder": 1, "Answers": [ { "AnswerId": "${GetAnswerId1#Response#$['AnswerId']}", "AnswerDescription": "${GetAnswerId1#Response#$['AnswerDescription']}", "AnswerType": "${GetAnswerId1#Response#$['AnswerType']}", "Selected": false, "AnswerOrder": 1, "IsCorrectAnswer": true }, { "AnswerId": "${GetAnswerId2#Response#$['AnswerId']}", "AnswerDescription": "${GetAnswerId2#Response#$['AnswerDescription']}", "AnswerType": "${GetAnswerId2#Response#$['AnswerType']}", "Selected": false, "AnswerOrder": 2, "IsCorrectAnswer": false } ] }, { "QuestionId": "${GetQuesByID2#Response#$['QuestionId']}", "QuestionDescription": "${GetQuesByID2#Response#$['QuestionDescription']}", "IsRequired": false, "ResponseTypeCode": "Radio Button", "ValidationTypeCode": "Required", "QuestionOrder": 1, "Answers": [ { "AnswerId": "${GetAnswerId1#Response#$['AnswerId']}", "AnswerDescription": "${GetAnswerId1#Response#$['AnswerDescription']}", "AnswerType": "${GetAnswerId1#Response#$['AnswerType']}", "Selected": false, "AnswerOrder": 1, "IsCorrectAnswer": true }, { "AnswerId": "${GetAnswerId2#Response#$['AnswerId']}", "AnswerDescription": "${GetAnswerId2#Response#$['AnswerDescription']}", "AnswerType": "${GetAnswerId2#Response#$['AnswerType']}", "Selected": false, "AnswerOrder": 2, "IsCorrectAnswer": false } ] }
], "Status": "A" }

con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody
